Bash("d:\\AI PR\\AIPR\\backend\\venv\\Scripts\\python.exe" -c "
import re

def normalize_key\(key\):
    # Insert underscore before uppercase letters \(for camelCase/PascalCase\)
    normalized = re.sub\(r''\([a-z]\)\([A-Z]\)'', r''\\1_\\2'', key\)
    # Replace spaces, hyphens, and dots with underscores  
    normalized = normalized.replace\('' '', ''_''\).replace\(''-'', ''_''\).replace\(''.'', ''_''\)
    # Remove duplicate underscores and convert to lowercase
    normalized = re.sub\(r''_+'', ''_'', normalized\).lower\(\).strip\(''_''\)
    return normalized

# Test cases
test_cases = [
    ''communicationProtocol'',      # camelCase
    ''communication_protocol'',      # snake_case  
    ''Communication Protocol'',      # Spaced
    ''CommunicationProtocol'',       # PascalCase
    ''Electrical.communicationProtocol'',  # Dotted path
]

print\(''Key Normalization Tests:''\)
print\(''='' * 50\)
for tc in test_cases:
    result = normalize_key\(tc\)
    print\(f''{tc:40} -> {result}''\)

# Verify they all normalize to the same base key
normalized_results = [normalize_key\(tc\) for tc in test_cases]
base_key = ''communication_protocol''
print\(\)
print\(f''All contain ""{base_key}"": {all\(base_key in r for r in normalized_results\)}''\)
")
